channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk’s latest plan to add Venmo-like payments to X excludes crypto
item.description: New details have emerged of Musk's plans to launch X Payments, part of a bid to create "an everything app."

item.title: SpaceX unveils backpack-sized 'Starlink Mini' satellite internet antenna for $599
item.description: SpaceX is rolling out a compact version of its satellite internet antennas called "Starlink Mini."

item.title: Nvidia’s stock turns sharply lower with a $230 billion swing in market cap
Beware, finance bros: AI is coming for banking before any other kinds of jobs, Citigroup warns
item.description: AI will “profoundly change money,” Citigroup says, and create plenty of “losers” along the way.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Gilead Sciences, Accenture, Trump Media, AMD and more
item.description: Names on the move ahead of the open.

item.title: Trump Media’s stock has slid more than 30% over the past five days
The ‘affordability crisis’ has long plagued renters—but now it’s coming for homeowners
item.description: Nearly one in four homeowners are now “stretched worryingly thin,” states a new Harvard University report.

item.title: Gilead’s twice-yearly shot to prevent HIV succeeds in late-stage trial
item.description: Gilead's experimental twice-yearly medicine to prevent HIV was 100% effective in a late-stage trial, the company said Thursday.

item.title: Biden White House applauds Walmart, Amazon for grocery discounts
I’ve been practicing medicine at a renowned institution for 40 years. Society isn’t ready for us to reverse the aging process across an entire population
item.description: Dr. Joel Geiderman is convinced there is a biological mechanism that triggers the onset of aging and with enough research, we will discover what it is. Sooner, rather than later.

item.title: Amazon's ditching the plastic air pillows in its boxes
item.description: The e-commerce company said it will replace plastic air pillows with paper fillers.

item.title: Nvidia's stock is falling Thursday, along with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq
Amazon got blasted by environmental groups for years over using reams of plastic. Now it’s switching to recycled paper packaging
item.description: The e-commerce giant said it already switched more than 95% of its packaging in North American to the new paper alternative.

item.title: Startup Kinetic rolls out robots to fix electric cars, and someday robotaxis
item.description: Menlo Ventures, an early Uber investor, just led a $21 million round of funding in Kinetic, a startup making EV repairs quicker and less expensive.

item.title: Hertz’s stock and bonds fall after company warns of much bigger quarterly loss
